name: Exemplar
aura: Increases Ally C. RATE in Arena Battles by 27%.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if this attack is critical.

Puts one of target's skills on full cooldown if the first hit is critical and the target is under a [Weaken] debuff.

Increases the cooldown of one of the target's skills by 2 turns if the first hit is critical and the target is not under a [Weaken] debuff.
skills.name: High Stance
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn and a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns.
